DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety of 15-day ceftriaxone versus 15-day doxycycline treatment in patients with multiple erythema migrans.
DOC.brief_title: Antibiotic Treatment of Multiple Erythema Migrans
DOC.criteria: multiple erythema migrans in patients > 15 years a history of Lyme borreliosis in the past pregnancy or lactation immunocompromised status serious adverse event to doxycycline or beta lactam antibiotic taking antibiotic with antiborrelial activity within 10 days
